name: Dragonfly (IMJOY)
description:
Story

You are [REDACTED], a pilot of a high-tech military aircraft on a mission to infiltrate enemy territory and gather intelligence. In the year [REDACTED], a new cold war has begun. Your country is at a disadvantage and must gather intelligence to level the playing field. You are a highly skilled and decorated pilot who has been chosen for this dangerous mission. The enemy's technology is advanced and you must use the advanced aircraft's capabilities such as flares, evasive maneuvers, and power-ups to outsmart them.

Control Use mouse cursor/ onscreen joystick(device with touchscreen) to steer the plane.

Left click to use evasive flares.
